byline.contributor: Kate Pastor and Michael Winerip contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.

abstract: Bronx District Atty Darcel D Clark has made prosecution of crime at Rikers Island her top priority, creating bureau that will eventually assign 30 assistant district attorneys full time to such cases; feels that Rikers Island complex is most problematic area under her purview, whether cases involve inmates, corrections officers, staff or visitors.
lead_paragraph: New York City’s main jail complex lies within Darcel D. Clark’s jurisdiction and is at the top of her priority list.

headline.main: Rikers Island Cases Are Focus for New Bronx District Attorney
headline.print_headline: New Bronx District Attorney Fixes Her Sights on Rikers Island Cases

snippet: New York City’s main jail complex lies within Darcel D. Clark’s jurisdiction and is at the top of her priority list.
